Package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus

Class IDPSegmentResponse

java.lang.Object
com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message
com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.IDPSegmentResponse
public class IDPSegmentResponse extends Message
If the segment index is invalid, returns ErrorResponse with INVALID_PARAMETER, which causes the pump to terminate the Bluetooth connection, so do NOT arbitrarily query for all segments.
See Also:

    • getIdpId

      public int getIdpId()
      Returns:
      ID of the insulin delivery profile in which this segment exists. Not to be confused with "slot"

    • getSegmentIndex

      public int getSegmentIndex()
      Returns:
      0-indexed spot in the segments list in which this segment occurs in the profile

    • getProfileStartTime

      public int getProfileStartTime()
      Returns:
      start time of the profile segment. The profile segment runs from this time until the next-configured profile segment start time in this insulin delivery profile. Expressed in minutes since midnight, see MinsTime and getProfileProcessedStartTime() helper.

    • getProfileProcessedStartTime

      public MinsTime getProfileProcessedStartTime()
      Returns:
      start time of the profile segment as MinsTime

    • getProfileBasalRate

      public int getProfileBasalRate()
      Returns:
      basal rate of the profile segment in milliunits. See InsulinUnit.from1000To1(Long) to convert to a displayable value.

    • getProfileCarbRatio

      public long getProfileCarbRatio()
      Returns:
      carb ratio, expressed in 1000-increments. A carb ratio of 5g:1u is expressed as '5000', a carb ratio of 10g:1u is expressed as '10000', etc.

    • getProfileTargetBG

      public int getProfileTargetBG()
      Returns:
      target BG in mg/dL used for corrections

    • getProfileISF

      public int getProfileISF()
      Returns:
      insulin sensitivity factor. A "correction factor" of 1u:30mg/dL is expressed as '30'.

    • getIdpStatusId

      public int getIdpStatusId()

    • getIdpStatus

      public Set<IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus> getIdpStatus()
      Returns:
      which fields in the time segment are filled out
